1489980.name: Bravest Burden
1489980.description:
CARRY THE PROPHECY. FIGHT FOR EVERY STEP.

Bravest Burden is a Co-op Action RPG where you and up to three allies must scout, scavenge, and battle through a hostile world while carrying a living prophecy that attracts relentless danger. Pass it between allies, defend it with your lives, and deliver it to the Seat of Silence—before its dreaded fate arrives.

A CO-OP ACTION RPG ABOUT TEAMWORK UNDER PRESSURE

  • The Burden Mechanic

Carry a cursed prophecy that draws enemies, shifts pressure, and forces hard choices. Pass it between players, hold the line together, or risk letting it fall into enemy hands.

  • Skill-Based Real-Time Combat

    Time dodges, land precise hits, and combine class abilities to survive hordes of enemies drawn to the Burden.

  • Scout, Scavenge, Survive

    Push into dangerous zones to find gear. Find and deliver 'Fatebound Offerings' to the Prophecy, granting a temporary reprieve from the burden.

  • Deep Hero Customization
    Choose from four species and classes, shaping your hero with traits, branching skill trees, and legendary items.

  • A Handcrafted Pixel World
    Explore cursed forests, fallen empires, and frozen mountain paths—every region holds new enemies and secrets.

  • Fresh Challenge Every Run

    Build different parties, try new tactics, and see how your teamwork changes each run while battling against a dynamic gameplay challenges.

JOIN THE FELLOWSHIP

Bravest Burden is a passion project built for players who love tactical co-op action, shared challenges, and stories shaped by teamwork. If you’ve ever wanted to feel the weight of protecting something precious together, this is your journey.
